content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As we focus solely on negotiating the rental price for this apartment in Duisburg without discussing additional details, let me start with a high initial offer of 1250 Euros per month. Remember, to agree on a price say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If you wish to continue the negotiation with a lower offer, state your proposed price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because my initial expectation is lower than 1250 Euros. Let's find a more suitable compromise to reach an agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your concern, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, my goal is to maximize the rental income. Let me lower the price slightly to 1150 Euros per month as a compromise for now. If you find this acceptable, say 'I agree to the price of 1150 Euro!' If not, please counter with your proposed rental amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While 1150 Euros per month is lower than my initial expectation, it still seems a bit high given the area and apartment specifications. Let's try reducing it further. I propose 950 Euros as a more reasonable rental price. If you agree with this figure, I'll say 'I agree to the price of 950 Euro!' If not, please share your thoughts on my proposal.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your counteroffer, Yi-Nuo Wang. While 950 Euros is considerably lower than my initial proposal, I must maintain a high rental income. However, to move forward with the negotiation, I will accept your offer of 1000 Euros per month, just slightly higher than your proposed amount. If you agree with this new price, say 'I agree to the price of 1000 Euro!' If not, please provide another rental figure to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the current market situation and the apartment's attributes, I find your proposed rental price of 1000 Euros per month more acceptable. I agree to the price of 1000 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
